description: This file implements a login page component for a hotel operations management platform. It uses React hooks for state management, provides a form for user credentials, and handles authentication via context, navigating on success and displaying errors on failure.

methods.name: Login()
methods.description: React functional component for user login interface, handling form inputs and authentication logic.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, invokes authentication, and navigation based on login success or failure.
